doc:
Helen Lederer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Lederer 0 Helen Margaret Lederer (born 24 September 1954) is an English comedian, writer and actress who emerged as part of the alternative comedy boom at the beginning of the 1980s. Among her television credits are the BBC Two sketch series Naked Video and BBC One's Absolutely Fabulous, in which she played the role of Catriona. In 2015 her comedy novel Losing It was published by Pan Macmillan. It was nominated for the P. G. Wodehouse Comedy Literary Award and the Edinburgh Book Festival First Book Award. Helen_Margaret_Lederer ( born 24_September_1954 ) is an_English_comedian_,_writer_and_actress who emerged as part of the_alternative_comedy_boom at the_beginning of the_1980s . Among her_television_credits are the_BBC_Two_sketch_series_Naked_Video and BBC_One 's Absolutely_Fabulous , in which she played the_role of Catriona . In 2015_her_comedy_novel Losing It was_published by Pan_Macmillan . It was_nominated for the_P._G._Wodehouse_Comedy_Literary_Award and the_Edinburgh_Book_Festival_First_Book_Award .
